hero.title: We're on a Mission to Make
hero.description: TRAVI is a community-driven travel platform that helps millions of travelers discover, plan, and book their perfect trips with confidence.

story.title: From a Travel Blog to a Global Community
paragraphs: TRAVI started in 2020 when our founder, David Chen, realized how difficult it was to find authentic travel information online. Most travel sites were filled with sponsored content and generic recommendations.

What began as a personal travel blog quickly grew into a community of passionate travelers sharing their real experiences. Today, TRAVI has become one of the most trusted travel platforms, helping millions plan their perfect trips.

We believe that travel has the power to change lives, broaden perspectives, and connect people across cultures. That's why we're committed to making travel planning as seamless and enjoyable as possible.

values.title: Authentic Experiences
values.description: We believe in real travel experiences, not tourist traps. Our recommendations come from locals and seasoned travelers.

values.title: Community First
values.description: Our community of travelers shares honest reviews and tips, helping others make informed decisions.

values.title: Quality Over Quantity
values.description: We carefully curate every listing and recommendation to ensure you get only the best options.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: We constantly improve our platform with new features to make travel planning easier and more enjoyable.
